a photo tutorial see the link on page 2 terms in round 1 colour yarn 4ch slip_stitch to 1st chain to make a loop round 1 4ch *3dc into loop 2ch * repeat from * to * twice more 2dc into loop slip_stitch into 3rd chain of starting 4ch break yarn and join new colour to corner space round 2 4ch 3dc into same space 1ch * 3dc 2ch 3dc 1ch * into next space repeat from * to * twice more 2dc into starting space slip_stitch into 3rd chain of starting 4ch break yarn and join new colour to corner space round 3 4ch 3dc into same space *1ch 3dc in 1ch space 1ch 3dc 2ch 3dc into corner space repeat from * to * twice more 1ch 3dc in 1ch space 1ch 2dc into starting space slip_stitch into 3rd chain of starting 4ch break yarn and join new colour to corner space round 4 4ch 3dc into same space *1ch work 3dc in next space 1ch for each space along the side then 3dc 2ch 3dc into corner space * repeat from * to * twice more 1ch work 3dc in next space 1ch for each space along the side then 2dc into starting space slip_stitch into 3rd chain of starting 4ch break yarn and join new colour to corner space keep working more rounds as given for round 4 changing colour at the end of each round until you have worked a total of 68 rounds or you have a size you are happy with border
